headline: How to Buy XOM for a 3% Discount, or Achieve a 15% Annual Return
summary: Yesterday, with Exxon Mobil (XOM) trading at $111.49, the October put option with a strike price of $110 was trading around $2.34. Traders selling this put would receive $234 in option premium.

headline: US Firms Said to Eye Pakistan Oil After Trump’s Reserves Claim
summary: Pakistan’s Petroleum Minister Ali Pervaiz Malik met with US Charge d’Affaires Natalie A. Baker last week in Islamabad on strengthening cooperation in the energy sector, according to the ministry.  Malik said talks with American companies on a round of bids for exploration blocks were already underway.
